In Mediana de Aragón safe payment of bouquet of flowers by Internet with teleROSA Florist

For teleROSA Florists, that our customers have complete security in the payment of your purchases is absolutely essential, so we offer different ways to make the payment. By internet you can pay via PayPal or via virtual dataphone directly on the page https of the bank, teleROSA doesn't have any access to the data of your card. If you prefer can also make the payment by transfer with your bank, in this case you need to make your purchase with at least two days in advance of the desired date of delivery. Another quickly and easiest way to pay is using your card by phone, you will be able to put in your order you want to pay by phone and one of our operators will call you, in this case all your data will be deleted immediately from our system once we confirm your order in the same moment of the call.
